titleStmt.title: Selfe deniall: or, A Christians hardest taske. Written by Christopher Wilson; preacher of the Word of God, &c.
titleStmt.author: Wilson, Christopher, 1579 or 80-1624.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Nicholas Okes, for Richard Whitakers, and are to be sold at his shop in Pauls Church-yard, at the signe of the Kings Head,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
Page numbers written over in ink.
